1118966898572627969.text: The #MuellerReport outlines, in painstaking detail, evidence that the Russian government interfered ‘in sweeping and systematic fashion’ in the 2016 election.

1118966746231332865.text: The Attorney General—the nation’s highest-ranking law enforcement official—is supposed to be free from political influence. Yet William Barr’s rush to defend the president by presenting only select facts calls into question his ability to serve as Attorney General.

1113800056363204610.text: This is one step, but a big step, in helping to address #PFAS chemical contamination in Oscoda and hundreds of other communities across the country. I will continue to work with the bipartisan PFAS Task Force we've established in Congress to push for urgent action.

1113799635930361858.text: PFAS exposure has been linked to many health issues, including cancer, high cholesterol, weakened immune system & hypertension during pregnancy. But for many veterans exposed to #PFAS, the military has refused to cover these health issues as service-related issues.

1113799142550200320.text: The VETS PFAS Act would require the VA to cover treatment of certain health conditions related to #PFAS exposure. Under our bill, PFAS exposure, as a part of military service, would be considered a service-connected disability, making veterans eligible for disability & VA care.

1113798509013217281.text:

Clean drinking water is not a partisan issue. #PFAS contamination affects hundreds of sites across the country, including Republican districts & Democratic districts. 

Our bipartisan PFAS Task Force is bringing Members together to more urgently address these harmful chemicals.

1088157212621586432.text: Finally, 4) Our bipartisan #PFAS Task Force will work to pass more robust funding that prioritizes remediation and ensuring that Americans exposed to PFAS, including our country's veterans, get the health care and support they need.

1088156689243820032.text: 3) Our bipartisan #PFAS Task Force will meet with congressional leadership and committee chairs, on both sides of the aisle, to ensure PFAS clean-up is getting the adequate attention it deserves in this new Congress.

1088156297629970433.text: 2) Our bipartisan #PFAS Task Force will continue to propose legislation to address PFAS contamination, including a national #PFAS environmental standard & urging the @DeptofDefense to more urgently clean-up hundreds of military sites with identified PFAS chemical contamination.

1088155893752086528.text:
